job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
We’re a team of passionate data scientists, software engineers, and subject matter experts with a vision to disrupt the simulation market by empowering users to build custom digital twin models that combine physics, math, and AI to solve various challenging problems in the energy industry and beyond.
We’re looking for entry-level or seasoned front-end developers to help us build innovative features for our web-based dashboard. The following summarizes the requirements and benefits of this role:
Responsibilities
Building intuitive experiences for users and data management.
Implementing simple yet powerful visualization tools for scientific and engineering applications.
Creating interactive user experiences involving human-human and human-AI collaborations.
Core Skills
Self-driven, curious, and passionate software developer.
Strong problem-solving skills or good engineering / scientific judgment.
Team player comfortable working in an Agile environment.
Coding Skills
Practical experience building event-driven and dynamic web applications.
Experience working with React or similar JS frameworks is preferred, but not required.
Comfortable with object-oriented programming, writing tested code, and good software design.
Background
A Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related fields is preferred, but not required.
Permission to work in the US.
Perks
Competitive compensation and benefits.
3 weeks of paid vacation per year.
Flexible remote work culture.
